LanguageData.TM.TimeToPauseAfter: Pause when finishing any job after it has been more than {0} in game time since last tactical pause
LanguageData.TM.NeverPauseAfterTime: Never pause when finishing a job not configured below
LanguageData.TM.MoveCameraAndSelectOnPauseLabel: Pan the camera to and select the colonist who caused a tactical pause
LanguageData.TM.MoveCameraAndSelectOnPauseTooltip: With this setting disabled, the game will still pause, but the game won't pan the camera to the colonist and select it.
LanguageData.TM.ToggleTacticsModeDesc: Toggle tactics mode for this colonist. The game will pause and center on the colonist when they finish a job, allowing you to micromanage them.
